articles.description: Kate Mara confirmed she is expecting another child with husband Jamie Bell and announced her pregnancy news in the sweetest way.
articles.content: Kate's road to motherhood wasn't easy. In June 2013, a month after giving birth to her and Jamie's daughter, the actress said on prenatal-focused chiropractor Dr. Elliot Berlin's Informed Pregnancy p… [+842 chars]
